div.p: It has been such a joy to lead Somis School for the past nine years. As you know this will be my last year serving as Superintendent/Principal. I certainly never would have imagined that I would be ending my 32-year career in education with a world-wide pandemic going on. We are all hoping that we can get back to school soon. It is very hard each morning not seeing all of the smiling faces of our beautiful students and families. Please know that I am committed to staying in my position until a highly qualified replacement has been found for the next school year. The search for my replacement is being done by the Ventura County Office of Education. They have created a survey and would very much like to have your input on the qualities you are looking for in the next Superintendent/Principal. Please click the link at the top of our website and let your voice be heard.
